group.description:
Brothers and Sisters in Christ, I’m @Shooglenifty. God is good and His mercy endures forever!
***By posting you are agreeing to our posting standards. We will remove a post according to our interpretation (written by us) of the guidelines below. If there is any confusion, please DM.
***My hopes for the group is to foster phileo between the Christian diaspora that has chosen to join this group. We want to be a place where unbelievers come for answers and believers come to be bolstered in their faith. By the grace of God through the blood of Jesus we will bring His love to multitudes. My reasoning? I believe this: "Never doubt God’s mighty power to work in you and accomplish all this. He will achieve infinitely more than your greatest request, your most unbelievable dream, and exceed your wildest imagination! He will outdo them all, for his miraculous power constantly energizes you.” Ephesians 3:20 TPT

***PLEASE READ BEFORE POSTING: Posts that are encouraged (think ENGAGEMENT! and WHAT IS GOD TELLING YOU!):

1. Testimonies, praise reports, prayer requests, encouragements, prophecies, words from God, exhortations, etc.

2. Questions of those looking to our community for answers that only God can give.

3. Sermons, articles, videos, pictures and verses as long as they have a good description outlining who, what, where, why and how. If you don't respect the link you are posting or the other Christians in the group enough to take some time with your post, please don't post it. 

***It seems most just post and run (seagull posting) and this is not God's heart nor mine. This group has ONE timeline. It also has many members. Is it respectful on your part to post several one-line posts in a row pushing someone else's well-thought post or plea out of sight of the group? 

With that in mind the following types of posts will be removed at the sole discretion of the moderators:
1. Off-topic posts: politics, flat earth, begging for followers or money (please reach out to the admin if you believe you have a worthy fundraising cause. You will be required to provide proof and cause. Any fundraiser posted without prior discussion will be removed), promoting personal agendas, etc.

2. Intentionally divisive, argumentative, disrespectful or racist posts.

3. Low effort (Just posting a video/link is not sufficient within the group, you must also write YOUR OWN description of the link/video; the included video/link description is not acceptable) or multiple posts in a row (limit of 2 posts per 3 hours)

4. Posts that don't meet the criteria mentioned above

5. Any reposts from other groups that are unrelated to Christianity; reposts of posts already in the group timeline (if you agree with a post just say it in the original post); and any reposts of your disagreements within a post brought to the group timeline.

6. Anyone who spams the same post to multiple groups (yes, I check timelines), or continually posts the same post/s in the timeline. 

7. All members who block the administrators and moderators will be removed.

***Remember that we are the body of Christ. Please keep your posts in line with Philippians 4:8 (ESV): Finally, brothers, whatever is true, whatever is honorable, whatever is just, whatever is pure, whatever is lovely, whatever is commendable, if there is any excellence, if there is anything worthy of praise, think (post!) about these things.

***“The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face to shine upon you and be gracious to you; the Lord lift up his countenance upon you and give you peace. “So shall they put my name upon the people of Israel, and I will bless them.” Numbers 6:24-27 ESV

***Group Creator:  @Micaiah
Admins/Mods: @Shooglenifty, @riustan

_source.content: Why isn’t this group more active? Some of us may want to make a comment on something we saw, but choose not to join too many apps. I watch some http://banned.video videos, but haven’t joined wherever people make comments.Your products sound great, but we choose not to use the internet for commerce. Still, I pray for you all daily and hope you succeed in informing the public. You technology is very efficient as I usually can get on the b.v site while tamer sites like Eric Metaxas and Lindell TV are hard to get on!  So, I hope that folks will continue to support you as you are getting through to us!! HUGS!!

_source.content: SUNDAY, JANUARY 8TH, BOOK OF THE DAY!Book of the Day, January 8th — Non-Fiction, Rated 4/4Temporarily Discounted:https://forums.onlinebookclub.org/shelves/book.php?id=595390Higher Connections- Humor and Inspiration from a Certified Public Pothead by Eric RightThis book has received a PERFECT 4-star rating by an official http://Onlinebookclub.org Reviewer!From the Author:After the holiday season, this book may be a nice way to unwind and learn about my experiences with cannabis!This book earned a Bestselling status in October 2022 and Literary Titan Silver Award for November 2022"What I consider as the chief positive aspect of this book is that aside from it being centered on the writer's experience, I see this book as a medium that encourages people to come out more, to be more in tune with themselves and not be afraid to discover things on their own rather than living under the dictates of society (in this case religion)."~OnlineBookClub reviewer.#non_fiction #discountedbooks ﻿#bookswithperfect44ratingsfromobchttps://forums.onlinebookclub.org/shelves/book.php?id=595390
_source.contentraw:
SUNDAY, JANUARY 8TH, BOOK OF THE DAY!

Book of the Day, January 8th — Non-Fiction, Rated 4/4

Temporarily Discounted:
https://forums.onlinebookclub.org/shelves/book.php?id=595390

Higher Connections- Humor and Inspiration from a Certified Public Pothead by Eric Right

This book has received a PERFECT 4-star rating by an official http://Onlinebookclub.org Reviewer!

From the Author:
After the holiday season, this book may be a nice way to unwind and learn about my experiences with cannabis!

This book earned a Bestselling status in October 2022 and Literary Titan Silver Award for November 2022

"What I consider as the chief positive aspect of this book is that aside from it being centered on the writer's experience, I see this book as a medium that encourages people to come out more, to be more in tune with themselves and not be afraid to discover things on their own rather than living under the dictates of society (in this case religion)."
~OnlineBookClub reviewer.

#non_fiction #discountedbooks ﻿#bookswithperfect44ratingsfromobc

_source.content: Apostle Eric vonAnderseck @apostle_ericv (IG) :I’m sharing Jesus’ testimony that He gave to my son, Apostle David, in 1984 when he was just 10 years old. Jesus took him in the spirit to confirm His plan to restore His covenant knowledge to the church.As you listen to the testimony, you get a clear understanding of why Jesus is dividing the counterfeit apostles from His true apostles.👉🏻 The church needs to hear this.👉🏻 Counterfeit apostles do NOT BELIEVE that God gave us ONE truth and ONE doctrine of Christ, neither do they believe in Jesus’ covenant knowledge.👉🏻 They hitched their wagon to political agendas and led the church in the wrong direction.Now that they see that God was not in that, they have hitched their wagon to the failed deliverance ministry of the past, but God was never in that.🔥 December 22, 2022 God gave Apostle David a PROPHETIC DREAM about the false vine that grew up in the place of His covenant vine.You can read about this DIVINE DREAM in detail in his blog to learn more.http://➡s8w.org/blog-post/prophetic-dream-the-false-vine-is-revealed (or click live link in bio)When ministers neglect the knowledge of the covenant of Jesus Christ they are operating OUTSIDE God’s house without a viable priesthood.That means that God cannot operate in them to heal their soul and form Christ within. Spiritual transformation is NOT taking place.“Deliverance ministry” is their substitute for God’s divine work. It has all the bells and whistles to attract believers who are desperate for change, but it is merely entertainment; it is not God’s plan for you.Acts 2:42And they continued stedfastly in the APOSTLES’ DOCTRINE and fellowship, and in breaking of bread, and#ministry #Jesus #vision #dream #wilderness #stormsoflife #discernment #spiritualgifts #christianspeaker #relationshipwithGod #evangelist #christiansofinstagram #Jesus #blog #blogger #blogpost #instablog #chriatianblogger #faithblogger #faithblog #news #qotd #counterfeit #false #apostles #deceive #church #online #churchonline
_source.contentraw:
Apostle Eric vonAnderseck @apostle_ericv (IG) :

I’m sharing Jesus’ testimony that He gave to my son, Apostle David, in 1984 when he was just 10 years old. Jesus took him in the spirit to confirm His plan to restore His covenant knowledge to the church.

As you listen to the testimony, you get a clear understanding of why Jesus is dividing the counterfeit apostles from His true apostles.

👉🏻 The church needs to hear this.

👉🏻 Counterfeit apostles do NOT BELIEVE that God gave us ONE truth and ONE doctrine of Christ, neither do they believe in Jesus’ covenant knowledge.

👉🏻 They hitched their wagon to political agendas and led the church in the wrong direction.

Now that they see that God was not in that, they have hitched their wagon to the failed deliverance ministry of the past, but God was never in that.

🔥 December 22, 2022 God gave Apostle David a PROPHETIC DREAM about the false vine that grew up in the place of His covenant vine.

You can read about this DIVINE DREAM in detail in his blog to learn more.

http://➡s8w.org/blog-post/prophetic-dream-the-false-vine-is-revealed (or click live link in bio)

When ministers neglect the knowledge of the covenant of Jesus Christ they are operating OUTSIDE God’s house without a viable priesthood.

That means that God cannot operate in them to heal their soul and form Christ within. Spiritual transformation is NOT taking place.

“Deliverance ministry” is their substitute for God’s divine work. It has all the bells and whistles to attract believers who are desperate for change, but it is merely entertainment; it is not God’s plan for you.

Acts 2:42
And they continued stedfastly in the APOSTLES’ DOCTRINE and fellowship, and in breaking of bread, and

#ministry #Jesus #vision #dream #wilderness #stormsoflife #discernment #spiritualgifts #christianspeaker #relationshipwithGod #evangelist #christiansofinstagram #Jesus #blog #blogger #blogpost #instablog #chriatianblogger #faithblogger #faithblog #news #qotd #counterfeit #false #apostles #deceive #church #online #churchonline

_source.content: In 2012, the Securities and Exchange Commission charged Pfizer Inc. with violating the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (FCPA) when its subsidiaries bribed doctors and other health care professionals employed by foreign governments in Bulgaria, China, Croatia, Czech Republic, Italy, Kazakhstan, Russia, and Serbia to win business. According to the SEC, employees of Pfizer’s subsidiaries authorised and made cash payments and provided other incentives to bribe government doctors to utilise Pfizer products.In 2012, Pfizer had paid $1.2 billion to settle claims by nearly 10,000 women that its hormone replacement therapy drug, Prempro, caused breast cancer. The Prempro settlements come after six years of trials, in which several plaintiffs were awarded tens of millions of dollars, including punitive damages for the drug maker’s actions in withholding information about the risk of breast cancer from Prempro.In 2013, Pfizer agreed to pay $55 million to settle criminal charges of failing to warn patients and doctors about the risks of kidney disease, kidney injury, kidney failure, and acute interstitial nephritis caused by its proton pump inhibitor, Protonix.In 2013, Pfizer set aside $288 million to settle claims by 2,700 people that its drug, Chantix, caused suicidal thoughts and severe psychological disorders. The FDA determined that Chantix is probably associated with a higher risk of a heart attack.In 2014, Pfizer paid $35 million to settle a lawsuit accusing its subsidiary of promoting the kidney transplant drug, Rapamune, for unapproved uses, including bribing doctors to prescribe it to patients. According to New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman, who led the probe, Wyeth got doctors to push the drug for unapproved uses, relying on “misleading presentations of data.”In 2016, Pfizer was fined a record £84.2 million for overcharging the NHS for its anti-epilepsy drug, Phenytoin, by 2,600 per cent (from £2.83 to £67.50 a capsule), increasing the cost to UK taxpayers from £2 million in 2012 to about £50 million in 2013.This is only a partial list of the fraud, corruption, and criminality of Pfizer. There are other examples of Pfizer unethically testing pharmaceutical products in the world’s poorest nations and participating in other criminal actions.
_source.contentraw:
In 2012, the Securities and Exchange Commission charged Pfizer Inc. with violating the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (FCPA) when its subsidiaries
bribed doctors and other health care professionals employed by foreign governments in Bulgaria, China, Croatia, Czech Republic, Italy, Kazakhstan,
Russia, and Serbia to win business. According to the SEC, employees of Pfizer’s subsidiaries authorised and made cash payments and provided other
incentives to bribe government doctors to utilise Pfizer products.
In 2012, Pfizer had paid $1.2 billion to settle claims by nearly 10,000 women that its hormone replacement therapy drug, Prempro, caused breast
cancer. The Prempro settlements come after six years of trials, in which several plaintiffs were awarded tens of millions of dollars, including
punitive damages for the drug maker’s actions in withholding information about the risk of breast cancer from Prempro.
In 2013, Pfizer agreed to pay $55 million to settle criminal charges of failing to warn patients and doctors about the risks of kidney disease,
kidney injury, kidney failure, and acute interstitial nephritis caused by its proton pump inhibitor, Protonix.
In 2013, Pfizer set aside $288 million to settle claims by 2,700 people that its drug, Chantix, caused suicidal thoughts and severe psychological
disorders. The FDA determined that Chantix is probably associated with a higher risk of a heart attack.
In 2014, Pfizer paid $35 million to settle a lawsuit accusing its subsidiary of promoting the kidney transplant drug, Rapamune, for unapproved uses,
including bribing doctors to prescribe it to patients. According to New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman, who led the probe, Wyeth got
doctors to push the drug for unapproved uses, relying on “misleading presentations of data.”
In 2016, Pfizer was fined a record £84.2 million for overcharging the NHS for its anti-epilepsy drug, Phenytoin, by 2,600 per cent (from £2.83 to
£67.50 a capsule), increasing the cost to UK taxpayers from £2 million in 2012 to about £50 million in 2013.
This is only a partial list of the fraud, corruption, and criminality of Pfizer. There are other examples of Pfizer unethically testing
pharmaceutical products in the world’s poorest nations and participating in other criminal actions.

_source.content: - Les villes intelligentes du Forum économique mondialDéjà implanté à Montréal et bientôt dans toutes les grades villes !De villes ou tout est connecté, l'internet des objets dont nous les humains seront traité dans un proche avenir comme des objets matérielles ...Le premier pas est fait ... "Alerte! À son insu la population est pucée à travers la « vaccination ARNm Covid-19 »https://crowdbunker.com/v/5RY6Vh2ebrhttps://crowdbunker.com/v/5RY6Vh2ebrhttps://www.c40.org/satan Klaus Schwab : Non seulement Eric Schmidt (Google) a dit qu'il y aura un combat entre les robots et les humains, mais que les robots gagneront. #Transhumanism #KlausSchwab #Agenda2030"Alerte! À son insu la population est pucée à travers la « vaccination ARNm Covid-19 »https://vk.com/wall654347703_13009 https://vk.com/wall654347703_13048La vérité vous rendra libre, mais d’abord, elle va vous déranger! (Gloria Steinem – Journaliste américaine)DR MIKE YEADON ANCIEN VICE PRESIDENT PFIZER DIT :https://www.eau-du-robinet.fr/alerte-pucage-bluetooth-generalise-de-la-population-a-leur-insu-a-travers-la-vaccination-arnm-covid-19« Je pense que l’objectif de la pandémie, les mensonges et les vaccins était de nous conduire vers une identification numérique électronique. …… Mais Si je voulais créer un système pour obtenir un contrôle total et avoir un alibi plausible, on ne peut pas rêver d’un meilleur plan pour gérer des milliards de personnes pendant des mois ou des années avec quelque chose qui les affecte et les tue !À leur insu, et sans leur consentement, les personnes qui ont reçu une ou plusieurs injections ARNm dites « Anti COVID-19 », sont « marquées », « pucés » bluetooth, de la même façon qu’on marque le bétail, les chiens ou les chats.Avec un simple smartphone la personne « vaccinée » peut être détectée, a quelques dizaines de mètres, par un N° MAC c’est à dire une combinaison de chiffres et de lettres, qui permettra de vous identifier de façon unique.Définition du mot adresse MAC (Machine Access Code or MAC)L’adresse MAC, aussi appelée adresse physique, est une séquence composée de chiffres et de lettres codées sur 48 bits, soit 6 octets. Elle est couramment présentée au format hexadécimal, en séparant les octets par un double point ou un tiret (par exemple : 00:37:6C:E2:EB:62 ). Ainsi, il existe virtuellement plus de 280 000 milliards d’adresses MAC disponibles.Les vaccinés deviendront ainsi un périphérique informatique en passant d’un « statut de personne” à un « statut matériel » dont objet ! Ce puçage est en totale violation de nos libertés, car les personnes vaccinées seront marquées à leur insu !https://youtu.be/j554s78wVpshttps://vk.com/wall654347703_12673 L’Organisation mondiale de la santé a décidé qu’il y avait 90% de personnes de trop. Voici une dame expliquant qu’il y aura un programme de vaccination forcée déguisé en volontaire. Cette vidéo date de 2009. #lockstephttps://gettr.com/post/p1dkgl0de34https://odysee.com/@silverreport:6/lockstep:0Projet #Neom : #5G, notre mort programmée ( épisode 11 )https://vk.com/wall654347703_12521Serge Monast - DÉVOILEMENT DU COMPLOT - PLAN DU CHAOS ET MARQUAGE DE L'HUMANITE. [PDF FR] 💥💥💥💥💥Depuis plusieurs années, il existe des projets visant le marquage des individus par laser sur le front ou sur le poignet. Aujourd'hui, le Nouvel Ordre Mondial est allé plus loin, car il est à même de réaliser son rêve de contrôle complet du « cheptel humain ». Comment ? Par l'injection d'une puce électronique sur chaque être vivant avec l'attribution d'un numéro de 18 chiffres composé de trois séries de six chiffres ; un nombre chiffré qui serait inscrit par tatouage au laser sur le front ou sur le dos de la main ; une « marque internationale » pourrait à elle seule mettre fin à toutes les monnaies. « Aucun individu ne pourrait acheter ou vendre sans avoir l'attribution de cette marque chiffrée... » Ceci sera l'objet de la première partie de ce document, puis en seconde partie, nous tenterons de comprendre pourquoi nos écoles ont produit une jeunesse qui, dans sa grande majorité, est sans foi, sans valeurs morales, sans esprit de discernement et ayant pour unique perspective celle de servir le Système selon une morale « antichrétienne » et « humaniste ». Nous nous pencherons enfin sur les formes policières et militaires constituées par les cadres du « Gouvernement Mondial » : des cadres choisis parmi les brillants promus des écoles de « l'idéologie des lumières ». Ce Gouvernement Mondial au service du Mal a pour dessein d'asseoir le fils de la perdition (l'Antéchrist), car il a besoin d'une force d'action multinationale omniprésente qui ne peut se constituer qu'à partir d'éléments nationaux !https://vk.com/wall654347703_12457

https://crowdbunker.com/v/5RY6Vh2ebr
https://crowdbunker.com/v/5RY6Vh2ebr
https://www.c40.org/
satan Klaus Schwab : Non seulement Eric Schmidt (Google) a dit qu'il y aura un combat entre les robots et les humains, mais que les robots gagneront. #Transhumanism #KlausSchwab #Agenda2030
"Alerte! À son insu la population est pucée à travers la « vaccination ARNm Covid-19 »
https://vk.com/wall654347703_13009 https://vk.com/wall654347703_13048
La vérité vous rendra libre, mais d’abord, elle va vous déranger! (Gloria Steinem – Journaliste américaine)

DR MIKE YEADON ANCIEN VICE PRESIDENT PFIZER DIT :
https://www.eau-du-robinet.fr/alerte-pucage-bluetooth-generalise-de-la-population-a-leur-insu-a-travers-la-vaccination-arnm-covid-19
« Je pense que l’objectif de la pandémie, les mensonges et les vaccins était de nous conduire vers une identification numérique électronique. …… Mais Si je voulais créer un système pour obtenir un contrôle total et avoir un alibi plausible, on ne peut pas rêver d’un meilleur plan pour gérer des milliards de personnes pendant des mois ou des années avec quelque chose qui les affecte et les tue !

À leur insu, et sans leur consentement, les personnes qui ont reçu une ou plusieurs injections ARNm dites « Anti COVID-19 », sont « marquées », « pucés » bluetooth, de la même façon qu’on marque le bétail, les chiens ou les chats.

Avec un simple smartphone la personne « vaccinée » peut être détectée, a quelques dizaines de mètres, par un N° MAC c’est à dire une combinaison de chiffres et de lettres, qui permettra de vous identifier de façon unique.

Définition du mot adresse MAC (Machine Access Code or MAC)

L’adresse MAC, aussi appelée adresse physique, est une séquence composée de chiffres et de lettres codées sur 48 bits, soit 6 octets. Elle est couramment présentée au format hexadécimal, en séparant les octets par un double point ou un tiret (par exemple : 00:37:6C:E2:EB:62 ). Ainsi, il existe virtuellement plus de 280 000 milliards d’adresses MAC disponibles.

Les vaccinés deviendront ainsi un périphérique informatique en passant d’un « statut de personne” à un « statut matériel » dont objet ! Ce puçage est en totale violation de nos libertés, car les personnes vaccinées seront marquées à leur insu !
https://youtu.be/j554s78wVps

https://vk.com/wall654347703_12673 L’Organisation mondiale de la santé a décidé qu’il y avait 90% de personnes de trop. Voici une dame expliquant qu’il y aura un programme de vaccination forcée déguisé en volontaire. Cette vidéo date de 2009. #lockstep
https://gettr.com/post/p1dkgl0de34
https://odysee.com/@silverreport:6/lockstep:0
Projet #Neom : #5G, notre mort programmée ( épisode 11 )
https://vk.com/wall654347703_12521
Serge Monast - DÉVOILEMENT DU COMPLOT - PLAN DU CHAOS ET MARQUAGE DE L'HUMANITE. [PDF FR] 💥💥💥💥💥

Depuis plusieurs années, il existe des projets visant le marquage des individus par laser sur le front ou sur le poignet. Aujourd'hui, le Nouvel Ordre Mondial est allé plus loin, car il est à même de réaliser son rêve de contrôle complet du « cheptel humain ». Comment ? Par l'injection d'une puce électronique sur chaque être vivant avec l'attribution d'un numéro de 18 chiffres composé de trois séries de six chiffres ; un nombre chiffré qui serait inscrit par tatouage au laser sur le front ou sur le dos de la main ; une « marque internationale » pourrait à elle seule mettre fin à toutes les monnaies. « Aucun individu ne pourrait acheter ou vendre sans avoir l'attribution de cette marque chiffrée... » Ceci sera l'objet de la première partie de ce document, puis en seconde partie, nous tenterons de comprendre pourquoi nos écoles ont produit une jeunesse qui, dans sa grande majorité, est sans foi, sans valeurs morales, sans esprit de discernement et ayant pour unique perspective celle de servir le Système selon une morale « antichrétienne » et « humaniste ». Nous nous pencherons enfin sur les formes policières et militaires constituées par les cadres du « Gouvernement Mondial » : des cadres choisis parmi les brillants promus des écoles de « l'idéologie des lumières ». Ce Gouvernement Mondial au service du Mal a pour dessein d'asseoir le fils de la perdition (l'Antéchrist), car il a besoin d'une force d'action multinationale omniprésente qui ne peut se constituer qu'à partir d'éléments nationaux !
https://vk.com/wall654347703_12457

Elle est couramment présentée au format hexadécimal, en séparant les octets par un double point ou un tiret (par exemple : 00:37:6C:E2:EB:62 ). Ainsi, il existe virtuellement plus de 280 000 milliards d’adresses MAC disponibles.

Les vaccinés deviendront ainsi un périphérique informatique en passant d’un « statut de personne” à un « statut matériel » dont objet ! Ce puçage est en totale violation de nos libertés, car les personnes vaccinées seront marquées à leur insu !
https://youtu.be/j554s78wVps

https://vk.com/wall654347703_12673 L’Organisation mondiale de la santé a décidé qu’il y avait 90% de personnes de trop. Voici une dame expliquant qu’il y aura un programme de vaccination forcée déguisé en volontaire. Cette vidéo date de 2009. #lockstep
https://gettr.com/post/p1dkgl0de34
https://odysee.com/@silverreport:6/lockstep:0
Projet #Neom : #5G, notre mort programmée ( épisode 11 )
https://vk.com/wall654347703_12521
Serge Monast - DÉVOILEMENT DU COMPLOT - PLAN DU CHAOS ET MARQUAGE DE L'HUMANITE. [PDF FR] 💥💥💥💥💥

Depuis plusieurs années, il existe des projets visant le marquage des individus par laser sur le front ou sur le poignet. Aujourd'hui, le Nouvel Ordre Mondial est allé plus loin, car il est à même de réaliser son rêve de contrôle complet du « cheptel humain ». Comment ? Par l'injection d'une puce électronique sur chaque être vivant avec l'attribution d'un numéro de 18 chiffres composé de trois séries de six chiffres ; un nombre chiffré qui serait inscrit par tatouage au laser sur le front ou sur le dos de la main ; une « marque internationale » pourrait à elle seule mettre fin à toutes les monnaies. « Aucun individu ne pourrait acheter ou vendre sans avoir l'attribution de cette marque chiffrée... » Ceci sera l'objet de la première partie de ce document, puis en seconde partie, nous tenterons de comprendre pourquoi nos écoles ont produit une jeunesse qui, dans sa grande majorité, est sans foi, sans valeurs morales, sans esprit de discernement et ayant pour unique perspective celle de servir le Système selon une morale « antichrétienne » et « humaniste ». Nous nous pencherons enfin sur les formes policières et militaires constituées par les cadres du « Gouvernement Mondial » : des cadres choisis parmi les brillants promus des écoles de « l'idéologie des lumières ». Ce Gouvernement Mondial au service du Mal a pour dessein d'asseoir le fils de la perdition (l'Antéchrist), car il a besoin d'une force d'action multinationale omniprésente qui ne peut se constituer qu'à partir d'éléments nationaux !
https://vk.com/wall654347703_12457

card.title: White House Pushed Facebook to Censor Tucker Carlson on COVID-19 Vaccines: AG Landry

_source.content: The White House pressured Facebook to take action against Fox News host Tucker Carlson for supposedly saying COVID-19 vaccines “don’t work,” according to a document released by Louisiana’s Republican Attorney General Jeff Landry, who characterized the move as a request to censor the journalist.Landry shared the document—an email exchange between White House Director of Digital Strategy Rob Flaherty and an unidentified Facebook employee—in a Jan. 7 post on Twitter, with the comment: “Rob Flaherty tells facebook to censor” Tucker Carlson.“Since we’ve been on the phone—the top post about vaccines today is [T]ucker Carlson saying they don’t work. Yesterday it was Tomi Lehren [sic] saying she won’t take one,” Flaherty reportedly said in the message to the Facebook staffer, whose name and email address have been redacted.“This is exactly why I want to know what ‘Reduction’ actually looks like—if ‘reduction’ means ‘pumping our most vaccine hesitant audience with [T]ucker Carlson saying it doesn’t work’ then … I’m not sure it’s reduction!” Flaherty continued, per the document shared by Landry.Signaling action regarding the request, the unidentified Facebook employee then reportedly wrote: “Running this down now.”The Epoch Times has reached out with a request for comment to Facebook parent Meta, Fox News Channel, and the White House, but no reply was received by publication.‘Hard Evidence’ of Government Collusion With Big TechLandry, together with Missouri Attorney General Eric Schmitt, sued the Biden administration in May 2022 for allegedly pressuring and colluding with social media giants to suppress free speech.Schmitt on Jan. 5 was sworn in as a U.S. senator and has been replaced in his role as Missouri attorney general by Andrew Bailey.Bailey took to Twitter on Jan. 7 to say that when he took the oath of office, he swore he would protect the Constitution and explained “why.”“We now have hard evidence that President Biden’s Administration colluded with social media companies to censor differing viewpoints and silence ‘misinformation’ that was later deemed true,” Bailey wrote in a series of posts.Bailey shared a screenshot of an email from White House COVID-19 Digital Director Clarke E. Humphrey to an unidentified Twitter employee with the subject line “Flagging Hank Aaron misinfo” and requesting the Twitter staff to “get moving on the process for having it removed ASAP.”In her request, Humphrey provided a link to a Twitter post by Robert F. Kennedy Jr., a known critic of the Biden administration’s narrative on COVID-19 vaccines.The offending tweet links to an article on the website of the Children’s Health Defense, an activist group chaired by Kennedy Jr. that left-leaning Wikipedia labels as “one of the main sources of misinformation on vaccines.”The article, from Jan. 22, 2021, says Aaron died 18 days after receiving a COVID-19 vaccine of an “undisclosed cause” and cites Kennedy Jr. as saying that his “tragic death is part of a wave of suspicious deaths among elderly closely following administration of COVID vaccines.”About a week later, the Fulton County Medical Examiner released Aaron’s cause of death as “natural causes” and that he didn’t have any COVID-19 symptoms, with his medical history listing prostate issues and hypertension.Besides requesting action on Kennedy Jr.’s tweet, Humphrey also added a request to “keep an eye out for tweets that fall in this same genre,” per the screenshot shared by Bailey.The Epoch Times has reached out to Twitter with a request for comment.‘The Truth No Longer Matters to the White House’Bailey also shared screenshots of several other messages that he said show collusion between Big Tech and the government to suppress free speech, including another message from Flaherty to an unidentified Facebook employee in which the White House official demands “assurances” that the social media company is taking actions “to ensure you’re not making our country’s vaccine hesitancy problem worse.”“The truth no longer matters to the White House,” Bailey captioned the post.“These emails confirm what we’ve known all along,” Bailey wrote. “The Biden Admin. has been colluding with social media companies to stifle opposing voices.”“I will continue to push back against this blatant attack on the 1st Amendment with every tool at my disposal,” he added.[Click on my replies or link below for rest of article]https://www.theepochtimes.com/mkt_app/white-house-pushed-facebook-to-censor-tucker-carlson-on-covid-19-vaccines-ag-landry_4968830.html?utm_source=ref_share&utm_campaign=copy&rs=SHRDKNKM
_source.contentraw:
The White House pressured Facebook to take action against Fox News host Tucker Carlson for supposedly saying COVID-19 vaccines “don’t work,” according to a document released by Louisiana’s Republican Attorney General Jeff Landry, who characterized the move as a request to censor the journalist.

Landry shared the document—an email exchange between White House Director of Digital Strategy Rob Flaherty and an unidentified Facebook employee—in a Jan. 7 post on Twitter, with the comment: “Rob Flaherty tells facebook to censor” Tucker Carlson.

“Since we’ve been on the phone—the top post about vaccines today is [T]ucker Carlson saying they don’t work. Yesterday it was Tomi Lehren [sic] saying she won’t take one,” Flaherty reportedly said in the message to the Facebook staffer, whose name and email address have been redacted.

“This is exactly why I want to know what ‘Reduction’ actually looks like—if ‘reduction’ means ‘pumping our most vaccine hesitant audience with [T]ucker Carlson saying it doesn’t work’ then … I’m not sure it’s reduction!” Flaherty continued, per the document shared by Landry.

Signaling action regarding the request, the unidentified Facebook employee then reportedly wrote: “Running this down now.”

The Epoch Times has reached out with a request for comment to Facebook parent Meta, Fox News Channel, and the White House, but no reply was received by publication.

‘Hard Evidence’ of Government Collusion With Big Tech

Landry, together with Missouri Attorney General Eric Schmitt, sued the Biden administration in May 2022 for allegedly pressuring and colluding with social media giants to suppress free speech.

Schmitt on Jan. 5 was sworn in as a U.S. senator and has been replaced in his role as Missouri attorney general by Andrew Bailey.

Bailey took to Twitter on Jan. 7 to say that when he took the oath of office, he swore he would protect the Constitution and explained “why.”

“We now have hard evidence that President Biden’s Administration colluded with social media companies to censor differing viewpoints and silence ‘misinformation’ that was later deemed true,” Bailey wrote in a series of posts.

Bailey shared a screenshot of an email from White House COVID-19 Digital Director Clarke E. Humphrey to an unidentified Twitter employee with the subject line “Flagging Hank Aaron misinfo” and requesting the Twitter staff to “get moving on the process for having it removed ASAP.”

In her request, Humphrey provided a link to a Twitter post by Robert F. Kennedy Jr., a known critic of the Biden administration’s narrative on COVID-19 vaccines.

The offending tweet links to an article on the website of the Children’s Health Defense, an activist group chaired by Kennedy Jr. that left-leaning Wikipedia labels as “one of the main sources of misinformation on vaccines.”

The article, from Jan. 22, 2021, says Aaron died 18 days after receiving a COVID-19 vaccine of an “undisclosed cause” and cites Kennedy Jr. as saying that his “tragic death is part of a wave of suspicious deaths among elderly closely following administration of COVID vaccines.”

About a week later, the Fulton County Medical Examiner released Aaron’s cause of death as “natural causes” and that he didn’t have any COVID-19 symptoms, with his medical history listing prostate issues and hypertension.

Besides requesting action on Kennedy Jr.’s tweet, Humphrey also added a request to “keep an eye out for tweets that fall in this same genre,” per the screenshot shared by Bailey.

The Epoch Times has reached out to Twitter with a request for comment.

‘The Truth No Longer Matters to the White House’

Bailey also shared screenshots of several other messages that he said show collusion between Big Tech and the government to suppress free speech, including another message from Flaherty to an unidentified Facebook employee in which the White House official demands “assurances” that the social media company is taking actions “to ensure you’re not making our country’s vaccine hesitancy problem worse.”

“The truth no longer matters to the White House,” Bailey captioned the post.

“These emails confirm what we’ve known all along,” Bailey wrote. “The Biden Admin. has been colluding with social media companies to stifle opposing voices.”

“I will continue to push back against this blatant attack on the 1st Amendment with every tool at my disposal,” he added.

[Click on my replies or link below for rest of article]

https://www.theepochtimes.com/mkt_app/white-house-pushed-facebook-to-censor-tucker-carlson-on-covid-19-vaccines-ag-landry_4968830.html?utm_source=ref_share&utm_campaign=copy&rs=SHRDKNKM
